content: the tide knot cover up is the perfect beach sweater this relaxed crochet cover up is oversized with cuffed sleeves so it s comfy and practical at the same time easy simple crochet stitches and chains combine to make a comfy lacy beach sweater wear it to beach throw it on over a swim suit or pair the cover up with jeans and a singlet underneath this relaxed and slouchy sweater exudes all the summer vibes this pattern is accompanied by a video tutorial slightly_smiling_face sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl skill level easy check out more free crochet patterns ** here 1 ** sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
